data.title: Breath
data.copy: Take a few deep breaths then close your eyes and place your attention on your ribcage expanding and contracting as you breathe.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Close your eyes and count the next 5 breaths mentally. Keep your attention on your breath.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Concentrate on your breath. Feel the sensation in your nostrils as you breathe through your nose for 5 breaths.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Close your eyes and focus on your breath. Count each you take.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Breathe very slowly and deeply with each breath.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Close your eyes and focus intensely on the feeling of your lungs expanding and deflating as you breathe.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Concentrate on your breath. Feel the sensation in your nostrils as you breathe through your nose.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Without adjusting anything, simply notice the natural rhythm of your breath.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Find a pain or discomfort in your body. Breathe into that spot. Feel the sensation change as you breathe in and out.

data.title: Breath
data.copy: Focus on the feeling of your chest rising and falling as you breath.
